messages.title: Meet the team
messages.content: Your council candidates for the 7th May.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cap rents and introduce longer tenancies.
Keep and expand food waste collection service.
Expand it to help small businesses and a 20% rate reduction for new businesses in their first year.

issues.economy: Expand small business rate relief and a 20% rate reduction for new businesses in their first year.
issues.environment: Keep and expand food waste collection service.

housing.content: Cap rents and introduce longer tenancies.

leaflet.personalStatement: Purna Sen is a Deputy Director at the Institute of Public Affairs and former Head of Human Rights at the Commonwealth Secretariat.
